quiz.question: ____ _ detour
quiz.explanation: 绕道; 迂回, 绕道. We had to take a detour because of road construction. 我们不得不绕道,因为道路施工。

quiz.question: devour _ ____
quiz.explanation: 吞食; 狼吞虎咽, 一口气读完一本书. She would devour a book in a single sitting. 她会一口气读完一本书。

quiz.question: spur ______
quiz.explanation: 马刺; 刺激, 刺激增长. Tax incentives can spur growth in the economy. 税收优惠可以刺激经济增长。

quiz.question: ______ zephyr
quiz.explanation: 和风; 微风, 春天的微风. A gentle spring zephyr rustled the leaves. 轻柔的春天微风吹动树叶。

quiz.question: _________ martyr
quiz.explanation: 殉道者; 烈士, 基督教殉道者. The Christian martyr died for his faith. 基督教殉道者为信仰而死。

quiz.question: ______ fracas
quiz.explanation: 喧闹; 吵闹, 街头喧闹. A street fracas broke out between rival groups. 对立团体之间爆发了街头喧闹。

quiz.question: pancreas ________
quiz.explanation: 胰腺, 胰腺功能. Diabetes affects pancreas function significantly. 糖尿病严重影响胰腺功能。

quiz.question: ___ specifics
quiz.explanation: 具体细节, 具体细节. Let's discuss the specifics of the proposal. 让我们讨论提案的具体细节。

quiz.question: ____________ ethics
quiz.explanation: 伦理学; 道德规范, 职业道德. Doctors must adhere to professional ethics standards. 医生必须遵守职业道德标准。

quiz.question: ____ ceramics
quiz.explanation: 陶瓷, 精美陶瓷. The museum displays ancient fine ceramics from China. 博物馆展示来自中国的古代精美陶瓷。

quiz.question: _______ mechanics
quiz.explanation: 力学; 机械学, 量子力学. Physicists study quantum mechanics at the subatomic level. 物理学家研究亚原子层面的量子力学。

quiz.question: _____ mnemonics
quiz.explanation: 记忆术, 学习记忆术. Students use study mnemonics to memorize information. 学生使用学习记忆术来记忆信息。

quiz.question: pediatrics ____
quiz.explanation: 儿科学, 儿科病房. The hospital opened a new pediatrics ward last month. 医院上个月开设了新的儿科病房。

quiz.question: _____ metaphysics
quiz.explanation: 形而上学, 学习形而上学. Philosophy students study metaphysics in their second year. 哲学系学生在第二年学习形而上学。

quiz.question: _______ athletics
quiz.explanation: 田径运动, 大学田径运动. College athletics programs attract talented athletes nationwide. 大学田径运动项目吸引了全国有才华的运动员。

quiz.question: _____ homiletics
quiz.explanation: 讲道学, 学习讲道学. Seminary students learn homiletics as part of their training. 神学院学生在培训中学习讲道学。

quiz.question: _____ genetics
quiz.explanation: 遗传学, 学习遗传学. Biologists study genetics to understand heredity. 生物学家学习遗传学以理解遗传。

quiz.question: ________ dietetics
quiz.explanation: 营养学, 临床营养学. She earned a degree in clinical dietetics. 她获得了临床营养学学位。

quiz.question: orthodontics _________
quiz.explanation: 正畸学, 正畸治疗. The teenager needs orthodontics treatment for crooked teeth. 这个青少年的歪牙需要正畸治疗。

quiz.question: ______ logistics
quiz.explanation: 物流; 后勤, 供应物流. The company improved its supply logistics system. 公司改进了其供应物流系统。

quiz.question: _____ linguistics
quiz.explanation: 语言学, 学习语言学. Students study linguistics to understand language structure. 学生学习语言学以理解语言结构。

quiz.question: aeronautics
quiz.explanation: 航空学, 航空学. He specialized in aeronautics at the engineering school. 他在工程学院专攻航空学。

quiz.question: scads __ _____
quiz.explanation: 大量, 大量金钱. The lottery winner received scads of money. 彩票中奖者获得了大量金钱。

quiz.question: ____ odds
quiz.explanation: 可能性; 几率, 很小的可能性. Despite the long odds, they succeeded in their mission. 尽管可能性很小,他们还是完成了任务。

quiz.question: _______ proceeds
quiz.explanation: 收益; 收入, 拍卖收益. The auction proceeds will benefit the charity. 拍卖收益将用于慈善事业。

quiz.question: _____ rapids
quiz.explanation: 急流, 河流急流. Kayakers navigated the dangerous river rapids. 皮划艇运动员穿越危险的河流急流。

quiz.question: _________ viands
quiz.explanation: 食品; 佳肴, 美味佳肴. The banquet table was laden with delicious viands. 宴会桌上摆满了美味佳肴。

quiz.question: ______ blinds
quiz.explanation: 百叶窗, 窗户百叶窗. Close the window blinds to block out the sunlight. 关上窗户百叶窗遮挡阳光。

quiz.question: _____ auspices
quiz.explanation: 赞助; 支持, 在...赞助下. The event was held under auspices of the United Nations. 活动在联合国的赞助下举行。

quiz.question: rabies _______
quiz.explanation: 狂犬病, 狂犬病疫苗. The dog received a rabies vaccine at the vet. 狗在兽医那里接种了狂犬病疫苗。

quiz.question: ______ facilities
quiz.explanation: 设施, 体育设施. The university built new sports facilities for students. 大学为学生建造了新的体育设施。

quiz.question: _____ securities
quiz.explanation: 证券, 交易证券. Brokers trade securities on the stock exchange. 经纪人在证券交易所交易证券。

quiz.question: __ shambles
quiz.explanation: 混乱; 废墟, 一片混乱. After the storm, the town was in shambles. 暴风雨过后,城镇一片混乱。

quiz.question: __ ___ throes __
quiz.explanation: 阵痛; 痛苦挣扎, 在...痛苦挣扎中. The nation is in the throes of economic crisis. 这个国家正处于经济危机的痛苦挣扎中。

quiz.question: ______ mores
quiz.explanation: 风俗; 习惯, 社会习俗. Every culture has its own social mores and customs. 每种文化都有自己的社会习俗。

quiz.question: ______ tresses
quiz.explanation: 长发; 辫子, 金色长发. The princess was known for her golden tresses. 公主以其金色长发而闻名。

quiz.question: _______ minutes
quiz.explanation: 会议记录, 会议记录. The secretary took careful meeting minutes. 秘书仔细记录了会议记录。

quiz.question: ___ dregs __ _______
quiz.explanation: 渣滓; 糟粕, 社会渣滓. The criminal was considered the dregs of society. 这个罪犯被认为是社会渣滓。

quiz.question: ________ belongings
quiz.explanation: 所有物; 财物, 个人财物. Please collect your personal belongings before leaving. 离开前请收拾您的个人财物。

quiz.question: ______ palings
quiz.explanation: 栅栏; 围栏, 木栅栏. The garden was enclosed by wooden palings. 花园被木栅栏围起来。

quiz.question: _____ filings
quiz.explanation: 锉屑, 金属锉屑. Metal filings scattered across the workshop floor. 金属锉屑散落在车间地板上。

quiz.question: ____ shavings
quiz.explanation: 刨花, 木刨花. Wood shavings covered the carpenter's bench. 木刨花覆盖了木匠的工作台。

quiz.question: _______ tongs
quiz.explanation: 钳子; 夹子, 厨房夹子. Use the kitchen tongs to handle hot items. 用厨房夹子处理热的物品。

quiz.question: _____ précis
quiz.explanation: 摘要; 概要, 简短摘要. The student wrote a brief précis of the article. 学生写了一篇文章的简短摘要。

quiz.question: ________ proboscis
quiz.explanation: 鼻子; 长鼻, 大象鼻子. The elephant proboscis is a versatile tool. 大象鼻子是一个多功能工具。

quiz.question: _____ ___ aegis
quiz.explanation: 保护; 赞助, 在...保护下. The project operates under the aegis of the government. 该项目在政府的保护下运作。

quiz.question: _____ necropolis
quiz.explanation: 墓地; 公墓, 皇家墓地. Archaeologists excavated the royal necropolis. 考古学家挖掘了皇家墓地。

quiz.question: ________ metropolis
quiz.explanation: 大都市, 繁华的大都市. New York is a bustling metropolis with millions of residents. 纽约是一个拥有数百万居民的繁华大都市。

quiz.question: _____ epidermis
quiz.explanation: 表皮, 外表皮. The outer epidermis protects the body from infection. 外表皮保护身体免受感染。

quiz.question: bourgeois _____
quiz.explanation: 资产阶级的; 中产阶级的, 资产阶级. The bourgeois class emerged during the industrial revolution. 资产阶级在工业革命期间兴起。

quiz.question: _____ debris
quiz.explanation: 碎片; 残骸, 暴风雨残骸. Storm debris littered the streets after the hurricane. 飓风过后,暴风雨残骸散落在街道上。

quiz.question: _____ hubris
quiz.explanation: 傲慢; 狂妄, 致命的傲慢. His fatal hubris led to his downfall. 他致命的傲慢导致了他的垮台。

quiz.question: _____ verdigris
quiz.explanation: 铜绿, 绿色铜绿. Green verdigris formed on the old copper statue. 古老的铜像上形成了绿色铜绿。

quiz.question: _________ stasis
quiz.explanation: 停滞; 静止, 政治停滞. The country experienced political stasis for years. 该国经历了多年的政治停滞。

quiz.question: ________ homeostasis
quiz.explanation: 体内平衡, 维持体内平衡. The body works to maintain homeostasis constantly. 身体不断努力维持体内平衡。

quiz.question: ________ thesis
quiz.explanation: 论文, 博士论文. She defended her doctoral thesis successfully. 她成功地为博士论文进行了答辩。

quiz.question: _______ antithesis
quiz.explanation: 对立; 对立面, 完全对立. His behavior was the perfect antithesis of professionalism. 他的行为与职业精神完全对立。

quiz.question: _______ synthesis
quiz.explanation: 综合; 合成, 蛋白质合成. Cells carry out protein synthesis using ribosomes. 细胞使用核糖体进行蛋白质合成。

quiz.question: _____ photosynthesis
quiz.explanation: 光合作用, 植物光合作用. Plant photosynthesis converts sunlight into energy. 植物光合作用将阳光转化为能量。

quiz.question: __________ hypothesis
quiz.explanation: 假设; 假说, 科学假设. The researcher tested her scientific hypothesis through experiments. 研究人员通过实验检验了她的科学假设。

quiz.question: Nemesis ______
quiz.explanation: 复仇女神; 宿敌, 宿敌人物. The detective finally confronted his Nemesis figure. 侦探最终面对了他的宿敌人物。

quiz.question: ____ __ Genesis
quiz.explanation: 起源; 创世纪, 创世纪. The book of Genesis describes the creation of the world. 创世纪描述了世界的创造。

quiz.question: apotheosis __ ___
quiz.explanation: 神化; 典范, 艺术的典范. The painting represents the apotheosis of art in that era. 这幅画代表了那个时代艺术的典范。

quiz.question: ______ symbiosis
quiz.explanation: 共生, 互惠共生. Bees and flowers have a mutual symbiosis relationship. 蜜蜂和花朵有互惠共生关系。

quiz.question: _______ osmosis
quiz.explanation: 渗透, 反渗透. The water purification system uses reverse osmosis technology. 净水系统使用反渗透技术。

quiz.question: _______ prognosis
quiz.explanation: 预后; 预测, 医学预后. The doctor gave a positive medical prognosis for recovery. 医生给出了积极的康复医学预后。

quiz.question: _______ neurosis
quiz.explanation: 神经症, 焦虑神经症. The patient was diagnosed with anxiety neurosis. 患者被诊断患有焦虑神经症。

quiz.question: ___ __ ellipsis
quiz.explanation: 省略号, 使用省略号. Writers use an ellipsis to indicate omitted text. 作家使用省略号来表示省略的文本。

quiz.question: ____ synopsis
quiz.explanation: 概要; 梗概, 情节梗概. The publisher requested a plot synopsis of the novel. 出版商要求提供小说的情节梗概。

quiz.question: _________ catharsis
quiz.explanation: 宣泄; 净化, 情感宣泄. The therapy session provided emotional catharsis for her. 治疗过程为她提供了情感宣泄。

quiz.question: _____ ecdysis
quiz.explanation: 蜕皮, 蛇蜕皮. Snake ecdysis occurs several times per year. 蛇蜕皮每年发生多次。

quiz.question: ____ gratis
quiz.explanation: 免费的, 免费. The software is available free gratis to students. 该软件免费提供给学生。

quiz.question: _____ nephritis
quiz.explanation: 肾炎, 急性肾炎. The patient was hospitalized with acute nephritis. 患者因急性肾炎住院。

quiz.question: __________ arthritis
quiz.explanation: 关节炎, 类风湿性关节炎. Rheumatoid arthritis causes joint inflammation and pain. 类风湿性关节炎导致关节炎症和疼痛。

quiz.question: _______ gastritis
quiz.explanation: 胃炎, 慢性胃炎. Chronic gastritis can damage the stomach lining. 慢性胃炎会损害胃粘膜。

quiz.question: _____ hepatitis
quiz.explanation: 肝炎, 病毒性肝炎. Viral hepatitis can be prevented through vaccination. 病毒性肝炎可以通过疫苗接种预防。

quiz.question: axis __ ________
quiz.explanation: 轴; 轴线, 旋转轴. Earth spins on its axis of rotation. 地球绕其旋转轴自转。

quiz.question: __________ annals
quiz.explanation: 编年史; 年鉴, 历史编年史. The event is recorded in the historical annals. 该事件记录在历史编年史中。

quiz.question: ____ alms
quiz.explanation: 施舍; 救济金, 施舍. The monks would give alms to the poor. 僧侣会向穷人施舍。

quiz.question: ____ qualms
quiz.explanation: 疑虑; 不安, 有疑虑. I have qualms about accepting such a large gift. 我对接受这么大的礼物有疑虑。

quiz.question: __ ___ doldrums
quiz.explanation: 忧郁; 停滞, 处于停滞状态. The economy has been in the doldrums for months. 经济已经处于停滞状态好几个月了。

quiz.question: _____ remains
quiz.explanation: 遗骸; 残余, 人类遗骸. Archaeologists discovered ancient human remains at the site. 考古学家在现场发现了古代人类遗骸。

quiz.question: ____ environs
quiz.explanation: 周围地区; 郊区, 城市周围地区. They explored the city environs on their day off. 他们在休息日探索了城市周围地区。

quiz.question: ___ kudos
quiz.explanation: 荣誉; 赞扬, 赢得赞扬. The team will win kudos for their outstanding performance. 团队将因其出色表现赢得赞扬。

quiz.question: ________ pathos
quiz.explanation: 悲情; 感染力, 感人的悲情. The speech was filled with touching pathos. 演讲充满了感人的悲情。

quiz.question: _____ ethos
quiz.explanation: 气质; 精神, 希腊精神. Ancient Greek ethos emphasized virtue and excellence. 古希腊精神强调美德和卓越。

quiz.question: apropos ______
quiz.explanation: 适当的; 恰当的, 恰当的评论. She made an apropos remark about the situation. 她对这种情况发表了恰当的评论。

quiz.question: ____ __ pincers
quiz.explanation: 钳子; 螯, 一把钳子. The crab used its pair of pincers defensively. 螃蟹用它的一对螯进行防御。

quiz.question: _______ bleachers
quiz.explanation: 看台, 体育场看台. Fans filled the stadium bleachers to watch the game. 球迷挤满了体育场看台观看比赛。

quiz.question: ____ __ pliers
quiz.explanation: 钳子, 一把钳子. Use a pair of pliers to grip the wire tightly. 使用一把钳子紧紧抓住电线。

quiz.question: _______ calipers
quiz.explanation: 卡尺, 游标卡尺. The engineer measured with Vernier calipers for precision. 工程师用游标卡尺进行精确测量。

quiz.question: ____ nippers
quiz.explanation: 指甲钳; 钳子, 指甲钳. She trimmed her nails with nail nippers. 她用指甲钳修剪指甲。

quiz.question: _____ compass
quiz.explanation: 指南针; 罗盘, 道德指南针. A strong moral compass guides ethical decisions. 强大的道德指南针指导道德决策。

quiz.question: encompass ___
quiz.explanation: 包含; 包围, 包含全部. The study aims to encompass all relevant factors. 该研究旨在包含所有相关因素。

quiz.question: surpass ____________
quiz.explanation: 超过; 胜过, 超过期望. The product's sales will surpass expectations this quarter. 本季度产品销售将超过期望。

quiz.question: harass _ _______
quiz.explanation: 骚扰; 困扰, 骚扰证人. It is illegal to harass a witness in a legal case. 在法律案件中骚扰证人是非法的。

quiz.question: crass ______
quiz.explanation: 粗鲁的; 愚钝的, 粗鲁的评论. His crass remark offended everyone at dinner. 他粗鲁的评论冒犯了晚餐上的所有人。

quiz.question: ____________ morass
quiz.explanation: 沼泽; 困境, 官僚困境. The project got stuck in a bureaucratic morass. 该项目陷入了官僚困境。

quiz.question: embarrass ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 使尴尬; 使窘迫, 使主人尴尬. Don't embarrass the host with inappropriate questions. 不要用不恰当的问题使主人尴尬。

quiz.question: canvass ______
quiz.explanation: 游说; 拉票, 游说选民. Campaign workers canvass voters door to door. 竞选工作人员挨家挨户游说选民。
